snippet.title: Ammossum — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🏹Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2659600/Ammossum/

Build an endlessly upgradable weapon! Evolve projectiles into unstoppable firepower in this action roguelike. Fight through hordes of infected beasts, save your family, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts filled with bullets, explosions, and acid. Can you survive the madness?

Trailer team:
Motion design – Sofia Shanina
2D artist – Sonia Bershadskaia (Sleepy)
2D artist – Eremurs
Sound design – Dmitriy Makarov

Contact us: devs@westgladegames.com
westgladegames.com
